message.body: I'm in need of some Indian food options. any suggestions?
I'd vote for either King of Tandoor (which is also byob, that's the one we went to one) or Tiffin
oops. I'm actually looking for entre suggestions. I'm in the Poconos and taking my parents for Indian.
Ah! Non-spicy: chicken korma (delicious cashew sauce). Otherwise anything tikka masala is a good intro, or tandoori if they prefer a smoked/grilled kind of thing
It also depends on the type of restaurant you're at though. Northern Indian is a lot different than other styles, for example. I'd just ask for their suggestions for someone new to the cuisine :-)
